graded nice looking:)

I do have two I could make available to you:

SGC 5 Hindu Mike Powers - 2K
PSA 1.5 Broadleaf George Stovall - 3K

Both cards look undergraded to me, especially the Broadleaf, with no creasing or paper loss, light corner wear, and great centering. I really have no idea why this card graded so low. Shoot me your email address for scans of these, if interested.

--Rob

unfortunately I have those thanks
assuming you meant george hunter
Yes; I got my Georges mixed up. My Broad Leaf card is of George Hunter.
